last_episode_to_air.name: Muddin' And Monzas
last_episode_to_air.overview: Tommy and the boys at Christmas Auto build a 1980 Chevy Monza to be a ten second track killer. Also, Steve tries to prove he's more than just a mechanic and brings in a 1974 Ford Bronco to turn into an off-road machine for this year's Truck Night.

name: Fat n' Furious: Rolling Thunder
overview: In the rust belt state of Ohio, speed reigns supreme - the faster the car the fatter the profit and every second counts. With a waist size that rivals the Rust Belt itself, Tommy Christmas and his family are known for driving big and living even bigger. "Fat n' Furious: Rolling Thunder" follows the hilarious car junkies of Christmas Automotive as they hunt down left-for-dead cars and bringing the back to life and to the racetrack.

seasons.name: Season 3
seasons.overview: In the Rust Belt state of Ohio speed reigns supreme - the faster the car, the fatter the profit. FAT N' FURIOUS: ROLLING THUNDER follows the antics of the hilarious, large-and-in-charge car junkies of Christmas Automotive as they boost business by hunting down left-for-dead cars and bringing them back to life.

episodes.name: Rustbelt Galaxie
episodes.overview: A 1964 Ford Galaxie and a 1969 Dodge Coronet are featured in the opener of this series, in which auto experts restore old muscle cars.

episodes.name: Supercharged Chevelle
episodes.overview: A 1971 Chevy Chevelle SS and a classic Corvette are featured.

episodes.name: Mustangs and Mavericks
episodes.overview: Rebuilding a '68 Mustang Fastback GT for a client; a 1971 Maverick gets help; Tommy is talked into rebuilding an ice cream truck.

episodes.name: Episode 4
episodes.overview: A father and son want to improve a 1977 Chevy Vega; tricking out a 1951 Mercury Coupe for a classic car night.

episodes.name: Episode 5
episodes.overview: The owner of a 1970 Plymouth Superbird wants Tommy's help in taking down a long-time rival; Chuck and Andy try to revive a car that is in pieces.

episodes.name: Episode 6
episodes.overview: Tommy's father wants work done on his 1969 Plymouth Barracuda, and agrees to a wager; Andy and Chuck work on restoring a 1956 Ford Short Bed.

episodes.name: Episode 7
episodes.overview: The crew transforms a '68 Fairlaine into a Cobra Fairlaine for a client; a '69 Firebird is fixed up for a bragging brother.

episodes.name: Episode 8
episodes.overview: Tommy volunteers to build a dragster for a young girl who is moving up the ranks; Andy and Chuck bring back a 1969 Camaro Z28.

episodes.name: Episode 9
episodes.overview: Christmas Automotive rebuilds a DeLorean; a local drag racing legend seeks help in rebuilding his '64 Chevy Nova that runs on alcohol.

episodes.name: Who's the Boss Mustang
episodes.overview: Tommy revamps a 1969 Ford Mustang Boss 302 for a client eager to beat his son's 2012 in a road race; the guys help a woman get her 1960 Thunderbird running.

episodes.name: Episode 11
episodes.overview: The gang restores a Patriotic 1969 AMC SC Rambler; flipping a couple of sleeper cars: a Shelby GLHS and a Dodge Spirit RT.

episodes.name: Episode 12
episodes.overview: Tommy and the crew are hired to recreate the classic Dodge Charger stunt car from "The Fast and the Furious"; a seasoned drag racer wants a 1978 Chevy Malibu.

episodes.name: Episode 13
episodes.overview: The gang rebuilds a 1975 Camaro for Chuck's son as a surprise graduation gift from boot camp; restoring a 1963 Impala for a police officer.

episodes.name: Episode 14
episodes.overview: Tommy and the others meet with a client in New Orleans over an update to a 1967 El Camino; A 1969 AMC Javelin.
